product_name: The North Face ThermoBall Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face ThermoBall(TM) hoodie jacket for women puts revolutionary new ThermoBall(TM) synthetic insulation to work. Warm and light, it mimics down, yet still insulates even when wet. Functioning like down feathers, the tiny round clusters of ThermoBall spun polyester trap warm air, while softly conforming to your body's shape. ThermoBall retains 80% of its insulating power even when dampened by rain, humidity or sweat, so you'll continue to stay warm. Small baffles in shell fabric allow insulation to fully expand to retain body heat; highly compressible ThermoBall insulation offers warmth equal to 600-fill-power goose down. Tightly-woven nylon shell features square stitching that helps hold insulation in place to keep it evenly distributed; Durable Water Repellent finish repels light moisture. Bound cuffs and hood; low-profile internal hem drawcord; stow pocket. The North Face ThermoBall women's hoodie jacket features a very lightweight construction.
short_description: The North Face ThermoBall(TM) hoodie jacket for women puts revolutionary new ThermoBall(TM) synthetic insulation to work. Warm and light, it mimics down, yet still insulates even when wet.
